sentences.english: The town has a population of 14,000.
sentences.chinese: 澤家鎮乃新欣欣九年制學校轄總人口14000人。

sentences.english: The other events of Pekahiah's reign, and all he did, are written in the book of the annals of the kings of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 比加轄其餘的事，凡他所行的都寫在以色列諸王記上。

sentences.english: And all the men of Jabesh said to him, "Make a treaty with us, and we will be subject to you."
sentences.chinese: 雅比衆人對拿轄說，你與我們立約，我們就服事你。

sentences.english: The town has a population of 19,000.
sentences.chinese: 潭溪鎮炳麟九年制學校轄總人口19000人。

sentences.english: The town has a population of 12,000.
sentences.chinese: 吉首市社塘坡禧福九年制學校轄總人口12000人。

sentences.english: The town has a population of 6,500.
sentences.chinese: 唐家橋思諭小學轄總人口6500人。

sentences.english: The town has a population of 4,700.
sentences.chinese: 鳳凰縣官莊鄉溪口梁繼焜小學轄總人口4700人。

sentences.english: Spring and Autumn period, Longwan become more jurisdiction in the country.
sentences.chinese: 春秋戰國時期，龍灣成爲越國轄地。

sentences.english: Develop the area marketing, and brand promotion.
sentences.chinese: 負責所轄區域市場的開發，和品牌推廣工作。

sentences.english: You shall not rule over him with rigour; but shall fear your God.
sentences.chinese: 不可嚴嚴的轄管他，只要敬畏你的神。

sentences.english: Seven years, black soil to the stream valley toast, Xigu jurisdiction.
sentences.chinese: 七年，黑峪土司改土歸流，西固轄。

sentences.english: Menahem rested with his fathers. And Pekahiah his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 比加轄其餘的事，凡他所行的都寫在以色列諸王記上。

sentences.english: This pumping station is responsible for periodic checks of pumps in its administrative area.
sentences.chinese: 這個抽水站負責所轄範圍內揚水設施的定期檢查。

sentences.english: And the chief of the house of the father of the families of the Kohathites shall be Elizaphan the son of Uzziel.
sentences.chinese: 烏薛的兒子以利撒反作哥轄宗族家室的首領。

sentences.english: Local federation of trade unions is the leadership center of various sectors within the jurisdiction.
sentences.chinese: 地方總工會是所轄區域內各行業工會組織的領導中樞。

sentences.english: Jurisdiction of 10 district offices, 115 neighborhood communities.
sentences.chinese: 轄10個街道辦事處，115個社區居委會。
